messages.content: What is ComfyUI-LightGlue and how does it relate to MotionBrush?
ComfyUI-LightGlue is an implementation of LightGlue for ComfyUI that generates a MotionBrush for DragNUWA. It provides a way to control the motion in images and videos using comfortable UI elements.
To install ComfyUI-LightGlue, clone the repo into the custom_nodes directory of your ComfyUI location and run `pip install -r requirements.txt`.
Where can I find example workflows for ComfyUI-LightGlue?

You can find example workflows for ComfyUI-LightGlue at the provided URLs: https://github.com/chaojie/ComfyUI-LightGlue/blob/main/workflow_video.json and https://github.com/chaojie/ComfyUI-LightGlue/blob/main/workflow_lightgluemotionbrush.json.
What tool is available for Motion Brush visualization with ComfyUI-LightGlue?
The Motion Brush Visualization Tool is available for ComfyUI-LightGlue at: https://chaojie.github.io/ComfyUI-LightGlue/tools/draw.html.
